build.script:
#!/bin/zsh
cd website

# Make resized social media card images
find "assets" -type f -name '*-start.png' -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' line; do
  filename="${line%.*}"
  finalname="${filename}-social-share-card.png"
  if [ ! -f "${finalname}" ]; then
	echo "${RED}Card image for "${line}" does not exist."
	cp "${line}" "${finalname}"
	magick mogrify -interpolate nearest -filter point -resize 437.5% "$finalname"
	magick mogrify -bordercolor black -border 250x0 "$finalname"
	echo "${RED}Card image "${finalname}" done"
  fi
done
echo "${RED}Card images checked"

# Batir le site
JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build

# Copier _Redirects
cp _redirects _site/
echo "${RED}Copied _redirects inside _site/"

clean.script:
#!/bin/zsh
git gc
rbenv install $(rbenv install -l | grep -v - | tail -1) --force
rbenv global $(rbenv install -l | grep -v - | tail -1) --force
gem install bundler
cd website
rm gemfile.lock
bundle install
jekyll clean

run.script:
cd website
JEKYLL_ENV=local_serve bundle exec jekyll serve --incremental --livereload --force_polling --config _config.yml,_local.yml
